title: Whatever his Clippers role, Paul Pierce seems ready to roll with it
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: NBA - Today 
Paul Pierce seems pretty agreeable for someone whom Doc Rivers once couldn't even get to pass the ball. The new Clipper will play small forw...
